title: Anything we can do about people like this?
body:
In my second game of ranked placements and my support Alistar (subject of this post) AFK'd for the first 15 minutes of the game leaving me 2v1. after a huge performance by the team we dragged it out to 50 minutes where alistar once again quit the game leaving us 4v5 for the loss. After this he added me and started abusing me to a very low degree;

[Deleted image]

replies.body:
wtf did you think was gonna happen when you accepted his friend request??? he would commend you on trying your hardest to win the game and that hes sorry about the loss when its only your 2nd ranked game??? 

protip for no sack oce players like you never accept friend requests and drag the chat bar off your screen so you wont be triggered by smack talk
That's shit, shouldn't be like that IMO.
start by blacking out their name

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/110424514/201704703?tab=overview
that guy still playing ranked now implying that riot didn't do shit to deal with that particular player
what you can expect from aussie employee tho
why should i black out the name? if someone is going to make death threats online do they deserve the privacy of having their name blacked out?

Hey man,

It sucks that you had to go through that experience, we definitely do take verbal abuse seriously. You can check out everything we are doing to try combat negative behaviour here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback

Your best bet is to report the player and leave a detailed description at the end of a game. Or in your case like Mutley and RogueStoney said send in a support ticket. If you want to have a discussion about what is and isn't okay to say you can post a screen shot but like Talon12 says make sure to black out the name in the public discussion.

> What if I want to know more about the vision for Player Behaviour?
> 
> Exploring Player Behaviour design values: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/exploring-player-behavior-design-values

> 
> Player Behaviour design values: Reward: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/player-behavior-design-values-reward

Please follow the **Universal rules ** (you can find this in the side bar)
> Reporting Other Players
> 
> Please don't name names. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We'll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.
> 
> Moderators will be looking for the following:
> 
> Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
> Posts accusing others of malicious activity
> Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
> Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (thereâ€™s a report button for that)

A) report them at the riot support page.
B) Add a riot member and tell them personally.
